SEARCH

Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    DatabaseDisplayStrategy
    the Database interface that is used to implement the strategy design pattern
    IPAddressGenerator
     
    Main
    The main class is responsible for the testing.
    MalwareActionObserver
    Represents an observer in the Observer design pattern specific to malware actions.
    MalwareActionSubject
    this interface describes the actions that are going to be observed by the observer interface.
    MalwareUnit
    MalwareUnit class that extends the Unit class for malware simulation.
    MalwareUnit.Action
    enum to Identify actions, making it easier to control the flow of the program
    MalwareUnit.LoggingObserver
    this class serves as a logger to the actions of the virus unit
    MalwareUnit.MonitoringObserver
    this class serves as a monitor for the viruses actions
    MalwareUnit.SimpleDisplayStrategy
    class that implements the DatabaseDisplayStrategy interface that takes IP addresses' List and passwords' List as parameters and displays them.
    MalwareUnitTemplate
    the abstract class represents a template that a malware action will use to pass the kind of attack that the virus will use
    MalwareUnitTest
    this class is used to write different kinds of tests for the MalwareUnit class
    Matrix
    The class that is responsible for running the simulation.
